Can you use the `generate` command to generate blocks in the background, without blocking the RPC call?
No, the `generate` command mines blocks immediately, before the RPC call returns. It does not generate blocks in the background.

generate numblocks

Mine blocks immediately (before the RPC call returns)

Note: this function can only be used on the regtest network

Arguments:
1. numblocks  (numeric) How many blocks are generated immediately.

Result
[ blockhashes ]   (array) hashes of blocks generated

Examples:

Generate 11 blocks
> verus generate 11
